ca.ualberta.taskr.models.elasticsearch

Class CachingRetrofit

  • ca.ualberta.taskr.models.elasticsearch.CachingRetrofit

  • public class CachingRetrofit

    CachingRetrofit class. This class is responsible for fetching cached data and locally mocking Retrofit calls instead of trying to grab results via elasticsearch

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CachingRetrofit.getServerInfo
      Return the server status of the server. A local cached copy will be returned if the network is unavailable and an updated copy will be returned if the network is available
      class  CachingRetrofit.getTasks
      Return a List of class Task objects from either a cached source or via elasticsearch, depending on if the network is available. If there are is any cached information that is not on the server this information will be attempted to be uploaded
      class  CachingRetrofit.getUsers
      Return a List of class User objects from either a cached source or via elasticsearch, depending on if the network is available. If there are is any cached information that is not on the server this information will be attempted to be uploaded
      class  CachingRetrofit.updateTask
      Attempt to update a task. If the task was succesfully updated, attempt to upload any other cached data to the elasticsearch server
      class  CachingRetrofit.updateUser
      Attempt to update a user. If the user was succesfully updated, attempt to upload any other cached data to the elasticsearch server

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CachingRetrofit(android.content.Context context)
      CachingRetrofit class. This class is responsible for fetching cached data and locally mocking Retrofit calls instead of trying to grab results via elasticsearch
